title: Babylon Viewer: simplifying viewing 3D models in web and native apps

content.title: BABYLON NATIVE
content.desc: The holy grail of software development is to write code once and have it work absolutely everywhere: on any device, on every platform. This is the inspiration behind Babylon Native. This exciting new addition to the Babylon platform allows anyone to take their Babylon.js code and build a native application with it, unlocking the power of native technologies.
